name: magefan/module-geoip

suggest.magefan/module-auto-currency-switcher: Install GeoIP Auto Currency Switcher Extension for Magento 2 (https://magefan.com/magento-2-currency-switcher-auto-currency-by-country). Use coupon code COMPOSER-FAN to get a 10% discount on magefan.com.
